info.author: Juan Manuel Bermúdez Cabrera
info.description:
campos
======

campos can generate forms from your model objects or help you to easily create
them using fields as building blocks. Take a minute to check examples dir.

Requirements
============

* Python 3+
* QtPy
* You need PyQt5, PyQt4 or PySide installed in your system to make use of
  *campos*. If several of these packages are found, ``PyQt5`` is used by
  default unless you set the ``QT_API`` environment variable.

  ``QT_API`` can take the following values:

    - pyqt5 (to use PyQt5).
    - pyqt or pyqt4 (to use PyQt4).
    - pyside (to use PySide).

Installation
============

You can use pip

``pip install campos``

or install it from the source package

``python setup.py install``

License
=======

This project is licensed under the MIT license.

info.summary: Helps you to quickly create and generate fully functional forms

campos

campos can generate forms from your model objects or help you to easily create them using fields as building blocks. Take a minute to check examples dir.

Requirements

  • Python 3+

  • QtPy

  • You need PyQt5, PyQt4 or PySide installed in your system to make use of campos. If several of these packages are found, PyQt5 is used by default unless you set the QT_API environment variable.

    QT_API can take the following values:

    • pyqt5 (to use PyQt5).
    • pyqt or pyqt4 (to use PyQt4).
    • pyside (to use PySide).

Installation

You can use pip

pip install campos

or install it from the source package

python setup.py install
